entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
